01601 
01602 /* macro to construct 32 bit value from 4 chars */
01603 #define CFE_TBL_U32FROM4CHARS( _C1, _C2, _C3, _C4 ) \
01604  ( (uint32)(_C1) << 24 | \
01605    (uint32)(_C2) << 16 | \
01606    (uint32)(_C3) << 8 | \
01607    (uint32)(_C4) )
01608 
01621 #define CFE_TBL_VALID_SCID_1            (CFE_SPACECRAFT_ID)
01622 #define CFE_TBL_VALID_SCID_2            (CFE_TBL_U32FROM4CHARS('a', 'b', 'c', 'd'))
01623
